    • 方法详细资料

      • act

        public void act​(long now)
        Act.
        指定者:
        act 在类中 Actor
        参数:
        now - the now

      • getStop

        public boolean getStop()
        Stop if frogger have reached to terminal point NUM_OF_END times.
        返回:
        the stop

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints()
        Gets the current points that player got.
        返回:
        the points

      • changeScore

        public boolean changeScore()
        Change score. 
         Once the frogger start to move, we will get a boolean true from this action and further change player's current score.
        This method is used in KeepScore and {AnimalMovementController}.
        返回:
        true, if successful

      • loseNumber

        public int loseNumber()
        Return the number of death in KeepScore so that so game ends when health is consumed.
        返回:
        the number of frogger lose.

      • enterWorld

        public boolean enterWorld()
        This function judge whether player trigger the Portal during the game in KeepScore
        If yes, return true. And then enter a new level.
        返回:
        true, if successful

      • getNumSecondflase

        public int getNumSecondflase()
        Gets the num secondflase.
        返回:
        the num secondflase

      • setNumSecondflase

        public void setNumSecondflase​(int i)
        Sets the num secondflase.
        参数:
        i - the new num secondflase
